message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's truly exceptional and offers unparalleled value. Considering its worth to us and its benefits to you, I propose a price of $9,500 for it.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your perspective and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value you place on the product, I am willing to negotiate further. My proposed price for the product is $9,000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,750.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. After careful consideration, I am willing to reduce the price to $8,900 for the product.
I appreciate the price reduction, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500.
I understand your position, Bob. Considering the value we both see in this product, I am willing to agree on a final price of $8,750.
